芝宇.definition: your appearance (honorific); cf 紫芝眉宇

芝焚蕙嘆.definition: lit. when one grass burns the other grass sighs (idiom); fig. to have sympathy with a like-minded person in distress

芝焚蕙歎.definition: lit. when one grass burns the other grass sighs (idiom); fig. to have sympathy with a like-minded person in distress

芝罘.definition: Zhifu district of Yantai city 煙台市|烟台市, Shandong

芝罘區.definition: Zhifu district of Yantai city 煙台市|烟台市, Shandong

芝蘭.definition: lit. iris and orchid; fig. exalted sentiments; (expr. of praise for noble character, beautiful surrounding, future prospects etc)

芝蘭之室.definition: lit. a room with irises and orchids (idiom); fig. in wealthy and pleasant company

芝蘭玉樹.definition: lit. orchids and jade trees (idiom); fig. a child with splendid future prospects

芝麻菜.definition: (botany) arugula; rocket; roquette (subspecies Eruca vesicaria sativa)
